Text: Hey Gondy10 mate.First of all thanks for those 2 games friend,great start,2 games with 3 of my favorite and enjoyable teams of my choise.And 720p plays like a dream in my TV..So Gondy and all of the fans of NBA and ofcorse all of the PB believers out there have a nice and very long NBA Season and enjoy guys.I know i will.Huzahh..;-)
